backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko actor with no methods defined.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing features, related files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries for various frontend source files and assets.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based styles defining OKLCH color variables, theming, and base styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React app via /src/main.tsx with no external font dependencies.
frontend/src/App.tsx: App component that renders the ValentineFlow as the root UI.
frontend/src/components/valentine/assets: Exports static asset paths for the couple image and hearts pattern.
frontend/src/components/valentine/conten: Provides shayari text, song metadata, quotes, and date ideas used across steps.
frontend/src/components/valentine/hooks/: Implements copy-to-clipboard logic with fallback behavior and status tracking.
Manages the moving 'No' button with randomized repositioning and pointer/touch avoidance.
Ensures only one audio track plays at a time with error handling and lifecycle cleanup.
frontend/src/components/valentine/ShareS: UI card displaying the current URL with a copy-to-clipboard button for sharing.
frontend/src/components/valentine/steps/: Displays a scrollable list of date ideas with themed icons and a back button.
Shows a congratulatory message with an image and a button to proceed to the next step.
Renders a playlist with play/pause controls using a single-audio hook and navigation buttons.
Presents a Valentine proposal with a movable 'No' button and a fixed 'Yes' button.
Displays a list of romantic quotes with navigation controls in a scrollable layout.
Shows a styled shayari text block with back and continue buttons.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Valent: Controls the multi-step Valentine experience and conditionally renders steps and the ShareSection.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, invalidating queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and helpers for managing Internet Identity authentication and login state.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers, theme CSS variables for light/dark modes, global typography, and custom utilities including animations and a hearts background pattern.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and an Internet Identity provider, and loads global styles.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors mapped to CSS variables, extended typography, animations, container settings, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Stores the projectâ€™s current build requirements, features, issues, and architectural notes for the Valentine-themed interactive web experience.
